title: Florida shooting suspect described as 'troubled'
text:
Florida shooting suspect held on 17 murder counts 8:36am GMT - 01:55 
Nineteen-year-old Nikolas Cruz is being held on 17 counts of premeditated murder, the morning after authorities say he opened fire at a Florida high school, unleashing one of the deadliest school shootings in U.S. history.   
Nineteen-year-old Nikolas Cruz is being held on 17 counts of premeditated murder, the morning after authorities say he opened fire at a Florida high school, unleashing one of the deadliest school shootings in U.S. history.  //reut.rs/2EFTpHj
